metadata.title: CVE-2020-23266 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gpac 0.8.0. The OD_ReadUTF8String function inodf_code.c has a heap-based buffer overflow which can lead to a denial ofservice (DOS) via a crafted media file.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
